description:
" THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98" is a fighting game released by SNK in 1998.
In the previous installment KOF '97, the story of the "Orochi Saga" reached its exciting conclusion. As a result, the next entry in the series THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98 was released as a dream match version of THE KING OF FIGHTERS Series.
It is one of the most popular and well known versions of the game, partially thanks to the many balance changes that received high praisessss from fans around the world.

The "ACA2NEOGEO" series is developed with the concept of faithfully reproducing arcade game masterpieces.
You can change various game settings such as the game's difficulty level, and even recreate the atmosphere of CRT TVs from back in the day.
In addition to competing for scores in online rankings, you can also compete with players from all over the world to see how fast you can progress through the game in "Time Attack Mode."
You can also enjoy simultaneous play in real time over the Internet in "Network Mode."
Please enjoy this masterpiece that defined an era.

*The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.

title: ACA2NEOGEO THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98
